Experience.Title: Professional Experience
Experience.Subtitle: My work experience
Experience.Desc1_1: Development of critical application screens (Auth0 authentication, interactive video & audio tutorials, user form).
Experience.Desc1_3: Creation of Beatbox Hero game: animation, game logic, real-time sound validation and reward screen.

Skills.Title: Skills & Expertise
Skills.Subtitle: Technologies and tools I work with to bring ideas to life

ProjectDescriptions.DroneNavigation: An autonomous drone model that navigates to a target while avoiding obstacles. Trained using reinforcement learning on Unity with ML-agents. From a university project in collaboration with Intellitech.
ProjectDescriptions.SnakeAI: An autonomous Snake model that learns to play by avoiding obstacles and maximizing score. Trained using a genetic algorithm with innovative pre-training.
ProjectDescriptions.HackathonSWERC: Participation in SWERC 2025, in a team with 3 other UTC students. SWERC is a European 5-hour algorithmic hackathon.
ProjectDescriptions.HackathonYouScribe: 1st place at the YouScribe x UTC hackathon, in a team with 3 other UTC students. The goal of the hackathon was to create a book recommendation algorithm for YouScribe platform users.
ProjectDescriptions.MailFast: A web application for writing emails quickly and efficiently using OpenAI's API. Uses Node.js, Tailwind and PostgreSQL.
ProjectDescriptions.Portfolio: My personal portfolio, built with Next.js, Tailwind and TypeScript. It showcases my projects and skills.
ProjectDescriptions.HackathonMC2I: Participation in the MC2I x UTC hackathon, in a team with 3 other UTC students. The goal of the hackathon was to create an accessible and responsible web application for UTC students. MC2I is a digital transformation consulting company.
ProjectDescriptions.XtraSup: AI for assisting in the selection of post-bac candidates wishing to join a higher education institution. Developed as part of a university project.
ProjectDescriptions.TicTacToeAI: AI capable of playing Tic-Tac-Toe. Uses a Minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning to optimize performance.
ProjectDescriptions.MinecraftMods: My first steps in programming with Java to create Minecraft mods.
ProjectDescriptions.TradingBot: Automated trading bot for the Binance platform, developed in Python.
ProjectDescriptions.GamingBot: Automated bot to play a video game for me with auto-click, allowing efficiency gains even in my absence.
ProjectDescriptions.ImageEnhancement: Image quality enhancement program for photos in Python.
ProjectDescriptions.InstagramScraper: Scraping bot to map friendship networks on Instagram.
ProjectDescriptions.ScreenResizer: Screen resizing program, used by a high-level Valorant player.
ProjectDescriptions.PygameGames: Series of mini-games developed in Python with the Pygame library.
ProjectDescriptions.DigitRecognition: Artificial intelligence for handwritten digit recognition using TensorFlow and MNIST dataset.
ProjectDescriptions.TitanicPrediction: AI to predict survival of Titanic passengers using Scikit-Learn.
ProjectDescriptions.RealEstatePricing: Artificial intelligence to estimate real estate prices.
ProjectDescriptions.AutoEcole: Complete driving school management system developed in PHP, allowing management of students, driving sessions, learning themes and planning. Developed as part of the NF92 course at UTC.
ProjectDescriptions.ReadmeGenerator:
ðŸ‘‰ readme.leolaborie.com ðŸ‘ˆ
Web application that automatically generates README files for your GitHub projects. Simply pass your repository URL and the app retrieves the project tree via GitHub API, then generates a complete README using a Google LLM.

Timeline.JavaStart: My first steps in programming with Java to create Minecraft mods.
Timeline.PythonDiscovery: Intensive Python learning in one week at a rate of 14h/day.
Timeline.CreativeExplosion: Development of a series of varied Python mini-projects and participation in the Mathematics Olympiad.
Timeline.AIEntry: Discovery of machine learning and neural networks, training on Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow.
Timeline.InnovationExcellence: Development of innovative AI and excellent results at the Baccalaureate.
Timeline.TechnicalDiversification: Expansion into new technical domains and full-stack web development.
Timeline.AdvancedAI: Development of autonomous drone AI with reinforcement learning on Unity.
